description: For all imaging orders linked to this letter, this item stores all  departments in which the imaging order is linked to a scheduled or completed appointment. This data is a union of data from the Imaging Performing Departments (I ORD 52645) item on the linked imaging orders.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the note record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID that consists of the department IDs of all the departments in which the imaging order is linked to a scheduled or completed appointment for all imaging orders linked to this letter. This data is a union of data from ORD-52645 on the linked imaging orders.
